**As a** developer  
**I need** CRUD functions for user class 
**So that** I could create, read, update and delete to manage all the users contained in my application.  
      
### Details and Assumptions
    * CRUD functions are crusial.      
### Acceptance Criteria     
    gherkin 
    Given one class or object
    When We have to manage or edit this one
    Then We need to create our CRUD functions because these are required.
